name: Beat the Heat _ Ver.1.0
description:
Welcome to "Beat the Heat!", a runner game that pits you against the citizens of a lust-filled town in a race to home! Do your best to avoid the swaths of enamored stallions to reach your house safely before your willpower is used up!

Use left and right to speed up and slow down, and up to jump, and be sure to collect floating powerups to regain some willpower!

Thank you to ArtsofAllKinds for all his work in programming and developing the game! Enjoy!

Development Info:

-This is currently an early version of the game; although it's far from finished, this release is as far as my programming knowledge will allow me to work.

-Please be patient when changing screens! The game takes a few seconds to switch from menu to menu, and it may look like it's hanging, but it's working! Thanks!
